Comment: The name of the checkpoint. Custom Map action

SourceString: Selected button = {Key}, will get unbound from the {NumActions}|plural(one=Action,other=Actions) = {ActionNames}
Comment: Input remap.  {Key} = key display name. {NumAction} the number of actions, this will determine what to choose between one and other.

SourceString: Selected button = {Key}, is not allowed as an input option
Not allowed to remap to thumbsticks
Not allowed to remap to Left Stick or Right Stick
Not allowed to remap to the Menu button
Not allowed to remap to the + Button
Change the display and locale (numbers, dates) language

Changes the speed of the game.
Higher speed might make the game have lower FPS.
Show damage as a floating number on the screen
Show a small health bar above injured enemies
Show voice lines as floating texts
Pauses the game when the game loses focus
Pauses the game when the user is idle for a certain amount of minutes
In Windowed mode you can interact with other windows easier. In Borderless mode you can quickly switch between applications.
Defines what aspect ratios are available for your resolution.

The desired resolution to use when rendering the game. It does not affect the UI.
Lowering it improves performance on lower end machines.

Synchronize the game refresh rate with the monitor refresh rate. Disable it for higher framerate and better input response.
When enabled it prevents screen tearing.
Limit the maximum frame rate for a consistent experience.
The higher the quality the finer the shadow.
Surfaces of the game world will increase in fidelity if the setting is higher.
Affects the quality of particles in the world, a lower quality might make some projectiles in the world harder to see.
Affects the quality of the post process effects after the scene is rendered.
Smooths out the edges by blending the colors of the pixels around the object to create the illusion of smoothness.
Realistic looking fog. Has a high performance impact, disable it to improve performance.
In certain areas background traps are deactivated or background visuals look cheaper to gain more performance.
Please use a gamepad in order to remap
Please adjust the brightness of the game to your display
These are not used to identify individuals, but help us to understand players needs to improve our game.
Mute the audio when the game window is not in focus
Mute the gibberish voices outside the dialogues
Mute the gibberish voices inside the dialogues
Please use a keyboard in order to change the keyboard input
Your progress is saved automatically whenever this icon is displayed
The path ahead is challenging. Do not despise failure. Every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
Note: Playing with a controller is recommended

Not Yet would like to collect usage statistics from your game automatically.
These are not used to identify individuals, but help us to understand players needs to improve our game.

Select "Send Automatically" to allow collection of usage statistics,
or "Do Not Send" to prevent the game from sending information to Not Yet.

You can change this setting at any time via the Settings Game tab.
